name: Firefighter in Hell
description:
The entrance to Hell opened up in Utah 7drl years ago. We finally know how to fight back!

Hell has a cold climate, if you put out all the fires it will freeze over.

We're sending in the best firefighter in the world to do the job.

A Deckbuilding Roguelike with real-time card combat. You can go over 1 billion levels deep into hell!

Controls:

   Most is mouse controlled, clicking and dragging.

   Use hotkeys in battle.

   How to Combo:
    Drag one card onto a copy of itself or a combo card OR simultaneously hit the hotkeys of two cards.

   Mobile controls should work.

How To Play:

Your objective is to extinguish the fires of Hell

When you start a new game, you create a deck of 5 cards by choosing 1 of 3 cards x5

You must traverse the Map deeper into Hell

You will encounter fires and demons you must extinguish or be overcome by flames

Your deck is not enough, it must be wielded skillfully.

Make use of combos to extinguish fires and demons quickly

Take opportunities to expand, sacrifice and upgrade your deck

Battle:

You will encounter two types of enemies - fires and demons.

  Fires will burn and spread across the board

  Demons will DOOM you.

You WIN the battle once all enemies are extinguished, their heat goes to zero.

  You LOSE the battle if a demon DOOMs you, which occurs when a demon has 66+ heat

  Boss Demons will DOOM you if they are over 200 heat.

To Combo, drag one card onto the other OR press both hotkeys

Combos are needed for better damage:

  You can combo 2 of the SAME card

  OR two combo cards together

  When choosing a card, make sure to check for combos!

The Map:

After selecting the cards in your deck. You will view The Map!

There are 5 different types of Locations on The Map

Demon Battle - Fight rare, uncommon or common demons

Boss Battle - Fight a notable demon

Player - You are here

Sacrifice - Removes a card from your deck

Upgrade - Gives all cards of type +1 Douse
